message: I propose a reasonable split considering we both lose value if we delay. You lose more than I do each round, so this is actually favorable for you to accept now.
I think we can both do better than that.  Let's split it more evenly, with me taking a slight edge since I lose more value each round.

Bob, consider that your money is now worth only 80% of the original value, while mine is worth 90%. If we continue further, you'll lose even more value. This split actually gives you more real value than continuing to negotiate.
